sentences.en: "We discovered it was totally the wrong decision." — "Really?"
sentences.cn: “我们发现那完全是个错误的决定。”——“真的吗？”

sentences.en: At other times, he'd force her to walk totally unassisted.
sentences.cn: 其他时候，他会强迫她在完全无人帮助的情况下自己行走。

sentences.en: Cream cleansers are totally off limits for oily skin.
sentences.cn: 油性皮肤不能使用洁面霜。

sentences.en: He said these figures were bogus and totally inaccurate.
sentences.cn: 他说这些数字都是捏造的，完全不准确。

sentences.en: He was a sound businessman, totally reliable and incorruptible.
sentences.cn: 他是个正直的商人，完全可靠，不会被收买。

sentences.en: I am reluctant to trust anyone totally, Your Excellency.
sentences.cn: 我不想完全相信任何人，阁下。

sentences.en: It is totally out of the question to postpone the midnight deadline.
sentences.cn: 想要推迟午夜的最后期限是完全不可能的。

sentences.en: It’s like learning a totally new language.
sentences.cn: 这像是在学一门全新的语言。

sentences.en: Playing for the reserve team is a totally different kettle of fish.
sentences.cn: 作为替补参加比赛完全是两码事。

sentences.en: She just totally blew me away with her singing.
sentences.cn: 她的歌声让我完全陶醉其中。

sentences.en: She was caustically brilliant, yet totally loyal, unpretentious, human and tolerant.
sentences.cn: 她这个人才气逼人，可是绝对忠诚可靠，而且毫不做作，有人情味和宽容心。

sentences.en: The house needed totally rebuilding, so we decided against buying it.
sentences.cn: 这所房子需要彻底重建，因此我们决定不买了。

sentences.en: This sentence is totally disproportionate to the alleged offence.
sentences.cn: 从所犯罪行来看，这一量刑完全不合理。

sentences.en: Totally exhausted, he tore his clothes off and fell into bed.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫不堪，胡乱扯掉衣服，倒在床上。

sentences.en: When they told me she had gone missing I was totally stunned.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉我她不见了时，我当时完全惊呆了。

sentences.en: Young people want something totally different from the old ways.
sentences.cn: 年轻人想要与以往截然不同的东西。
